portfolio.detail: Landing page responsive design is one of the five responsive web design projects in freecodecamp(fcc) web design certification, the project was fully fictional, I tried to demonstrate  my responsive design skills by applying CSS flexbox.

portfolio.desc: A CSS web design guideline that guides developers to follow the type of color and typography etc in their design.
portfolio.detail: This project was designed for Codecademy/pro web development career path course. The project was for further practice to gain the necessary skill to develop more sophisticated layouts. The design was my personal choice.

portfolio.desc: A survey form, that collects user information.
portfolio.detail: The Survey form is also a freecodecamp project, Which I have designed it to practice a form that collects user inputs, the design has no  backend operation, Its pure static page

portfolio.desc: Documentation site that has basic CSS styles and explanation.
portfolio.detail: Technical documentation site is also a freecodecamp project its main goal was to create a mini documentation site that is free to choose any content. The site is also responsive
